title: Cannot Escape the Devil - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Contracts   Different Social Status   Engagement   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Inferiority Complex   Nobles   Poor to Rich   Priestesses   Religions   Sickly Characters   Timid Protagonist
author: Hang Nang   항낭
description:
In the harsh land, I would do anything to survive. Even if it is selling myself to others. An arrogant and beautiful man who came across that way, a dangerous deal began. 

'Let's say I give you and your family enough support to live and eat comfortably for a lifetime, so what can you give me?'

There was only one thing I could give to save my family. 'I'll give myself.”

The arrogant but beautiful devil glanced at me, leaning obliquely on the bed.  

'What are you doing, without lying down?' It was the beginning of the entrapment that I could not escape. 
>
